seed_summaries.title: A Brief Tutorial on the Ensemble Kalman Filter

ideas.title: Exploring Nonlinear and Non-Gaussian Extensions to the Ensemble Kalman Filter for High-Dimensional Systems
justification_evidence: Proposes optimal transport and multifidelity control variates within EnKF
Benchmarks on Lorenz-96 with RMSE and runtime metrics
Positions vs RHF and GA-EnKF in related work
Focus on non-Gaussian scenarios with explicit experiments

ideas.title: Adaptive Precision Localization for Ensemble Kalman Filters
justification_evidence: Introduces adaptive sparsity in precision matrices for localization
Comparisons against covariance and fixed-precision methods
Experiments span Lorenz-96 and a high-dimensional geophysical system
Risk/limitations acknowledge computational overhead and tuning

ideas.title: Deep Learning-Enhanced Ensemble Kalman Filter for Nonlinear Data Assimilation in Chaotic Systems
justification_evidence: Integrates ResNet with EnKF for chaotic systems (Lorenz-96)
Evaluates vs standard EnKF and variational DA using RMSE/ACC
Addresses compute trade-offs with smaller ensembles
Notes generalization limits beyond the benchmark
red_flags: Potential overfitting and heavy training cost

ideas.title: Adaptive Non-Gaussian Extensions to Ensemble Kalman Filtering for High-Dimensional Systems
justification_evidence: Combines GA-EnKF and two-step updates with robust filtering
Evaluates on Lorenz-96 and real-world flood/air quality cases
Comparisons planned vs RHF, iRHF, CG-EnKF, NS-EnKF
Identifies scalability and tuning as limitations
